casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. SIMPSON
v.
HAMILTON CTY. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS 2019-0755 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 21, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Relator's motions to amend, to strike, and for appointment of counsel denied. Cause dismissed. O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concur. Fischer, J., not participating.
